releaseNotes: This release includes minor bug fixes, and we've laid down the foundations for cool upcoming features.
description:
The best card to use abroad is not actually a card at all – it’s a Curve Wallet. 

Hop from country to country without getting stung with hidden fees, unexpected bank charges and bad exchange rates – no matter what debit or credit card you spend with. Use the same cards you use at home, minus the fees abroad. 

Curve is a global travel wallet that lets you spend with almost any debit or credit card in the world without paying foreign transaction fees*. Travel light with your whole wallet in one single physical card. And stop bank charges in their tracks. If you love travelling but hate the unfair fees, it’s time to download Curve and spend freely around the world.  

Limits and terms apply. 

Limited time offer: Try Curve now and earn 1% cashback on your purchases in your first 30 days. Terms apply. 

Key benefits 

- Stop your banks and credit cards charging you fees abroad
- Save up to 3% on every purchase abroad
- Get the mid-market exchange rate with no sneaky markups 
- Get free ATM withdrawals up to £1000/month 
- Spend and withdraw from any account with a single Curve card 
- Gain more card support for Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, and Garmin Pay 
- Earn cashback as you spend, on top of your debit and credit card rewards 
- Earn credit card rewards abroad without incurring charges  
- Lock/unlock your whole wallet instantly in the app 
- Keep all your bank and credit card numbers hidden 



Travel light with all your cards in one 

Curve connects your debit cards, credit cards and PayPal account into one physical card so you can shop online and offline, anywhere in the world, with just one card. Link your card to your phone or smartwatch to gain wider card support for Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Garmin Pay and more. Juggling multiple cards with multiple currencies doesn’t have to be a struggle anymore. Step into the future with Curve and simplify travel money once and for all. 


Travel safe with a shield around your money 

Your card numbers are never exposed with Curve, creating an invisible shield around your wallet. If your Curve card is ever lost, you can lock it instantly with one tap. And even if it’s lost for good, you only ever have to replace one card, not your whole wallet. 

Earn cashback as you travel 

Whether you’re home or abroad, you can earn cashback on your everyday spending on top of any rewards you already earn with your debit and credit cards. That’s right – a double shot of rewards! Limited time offer: Earn 1% cashback on your purchases in your first 30 days

Can’t add a card to your phone or smartwatch? 

Add Curve to Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Garmin Pay, FitBit, Xiaomi, SwatchPay, and more to get wider support so you can use any card with your phone or watch. You can link your Mastercard, Visa and Diners Club international cards to your Curve Wallet. 

Download the Curve Wallet to save when you travel and earn as you shop – wherever you are in the world. Get 1% cashback on your spending in your first 30 days.


You need to be 18 years or older to sign up to Curve. 

*Terms and privacy policy apply at www.curve.app. Free FX subject to limits and weekend charges. Cashback with selected retailers. Limits and exclusions apply to cashback, see terms for details.
